Mitt Romney appeared on '' Piers Morgan '' and ''The View'' as part of a two-day media tour in conjunction with the paperback release of his book No Apology: The Case for American Greatness. He also appeared on Good Morning America and read the Top Ten List on ''The Late Show with David Letterman .'' of products, would take over as chief executive, succeeding Mr Eric Schmidt , the company's longtime chief. ''Larry is ready,'' Mr Eric Schmidt , who will become executive chairman, told reporters. It's time for him to have a shot at running this. Mr Eric Schmidt - who in a decade oversaw the transformation of a barely profitable Web start-up with 200 employees into the world's most- used search engine, generating US$ 29 billion($ 37 billion)

for the last decade, guiding Google to its position as a major online giant, in control of 60% of all online advertising. Eric Schmidt , in turn, will become executive chairman, focusing on deals, partnerships, customers and broader business relationships, continuing to guide the company but in a more ceremonial role. Eric Schmidt has said the new management structure will ''streamline'' decision making and comes at a time of strength for Google. The company
